nodes.text: The HSP-10 pursuit airspeeder was an air patrol model employed on Coruscant by the early Empire. With a maximum speed of 620 kilometers per hour, it required a single pilot and could carry three passengers; it was fully enclosed. It was capable of carrying half a ton of cargo and consumables for one day. The pilot could operate a double laser cannon and an ion cannon. A new craft cost 40,000 credits, but a used one only cost 20,000.
